Class MenuServices

java.lang.Object
application.services.MenuServices
@Service
public class MenuServices
extends java.lang.Object

    MenuServices()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<MenuItemModel> availableMenu()
    Returns a list of all the available items.
    void customerNeedsAssistance​(int tableNum, boolean needsHelp)
    This method is used to set the needs_assistance column for a table.
    java.util.ArrayList<MenuItemModel> getMenu()
    This method gets all the information from the menu and outputs it for use on the webpage.
    void jsonToDatabase​(int tableNum, java.lang.String stringOrder)
    This method parses the json of the order and it's modifications received from the frontend into a usable format from the backend using lambda expressions.
    void orderToDatabase​(int tableNum, int waiterId)
    This method sends the order to the database by calling the appropriate service.

  • Method Details

    • getMenu

      public java.util.ArrayList<MenuItemModel> getMenu()
      This method gets all the information from the menu and outputs it for use on the webpage.
      Returns:
      the full menu

    • availableMenu

      public java.util.ArrayList<MenuItemModel> availableMenu() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Returns a list of all the available items.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of MenuItemModel.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error in a SQL statement

    • orderToDatabase

      public void orderToDatabase​(int tableNum, int waiterId)
      This method sends the order to the database by calling the appropriate service.
      Parameters:
      tableNum - The table number
      waiterId - The ID of the waiter

    • customerNeedsAssistance

      public void customerNeedsAssistance​(int tableNum, boolean needsHelp)
      This method is used to set the needs_assistance column for a table.
      Parameters:
      tableNum - The table number
      needsHelp - Boolean for whether or not the table needs help

    • jsonToDatabase

      public void jsonToDatabase​(int tableNum, java.lang.String stringOrder)
      This method parses the json of the order and it's modifications received from the frontend into a usable format from the backend using lambda expressions.
      Parameters:
      tableNum - The table number
      stringOrder - The order itself
